item.description:
You asked for it! Here it is! Announcingâ€¦
The Singles Mingles Boston
Holiday Event!!!

We will NOT be at West -as recently posted- due to a scheduling conflict... :(
Instead we'll get right down to business - getting our dance on at Dance Friday! =) =)

Dance Friday is a place to dance barefoot, however you like, with or without a partner, to all kinds of music, in a smoke- and alcohol-free space. All ages are welcome; Admission sliding scale $12 -8, Casual, light-weight, comfortable creative clothing that you can easily move in is recommended.

Progressive M/F 30+ singles are invited to SMB events. There will be a lot of other wonderful (single, taken, all ages, LBGTQS, etc) people at Dance Friday. Any SMBers who introduces themselves to me after the "circle" (group) dances, can meet the other singles who do the same.

Your progressive fliers are welcome and encouraged!

Add yourself to our mailing list! Write list"at"singlesminglesboston.com
item.how_to_find_us: Just for idenfiability :) Rhonda will wear a cobolt blue wig until 9 at least!
item.name: SMB Event: First the bad news, Then the Good News!
